GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
wifi: wil6210: debugfs: fix info leak in wil_write_file_wmi()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 05ceda14ef7c73104e709c414c3680d8a59f51d4, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit ff974e4083341383d3dd4079e52ed30f57f376f0. For more details please see the references link.
